trans-unit.source: Represents a misspelled word in an editing control (i.e. <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TextBox"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.RichTextBox"></xref>).
trans-unit.target: 表示編輯控制項中拼錯的字 (亦即<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TextBox"></xref>或<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.RichTextBox"> </xref>)。

trans-unit.source: Replaces the spelling error text with the specified correction.
trans-unit.target: 取代指定的更正拼字錯誤文字。

trans-unit.source: This method repositions the caret to the position immediately following the corrected text.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會重新調整位置插入號位置緊接已修正的文字。

trans-unit.source: The text used to replace the misspelled text.
trans-unit.target: 用來取代拼字錯誤的文字的文字。

trans-unit.source: Instructs the control to ignore this error and any duplicates for the remainder of the lifetime of the control.
trans-unit.target: 指示控制項忽略此錯誤，而且任何重複項目控制項的存留期的剩餘部分。

trans-unit.source: Gets a list of suggested spelling replacements for the misspelled word.
trans-unit.target: 取得拼錯字的建議的拼字取代清單。

trans-unit.source: The collection of spelling suggestions for the misspelled word.
trans-unit.target: 拼錯字的拼字建議集合。
